summary: On a faraway planet where blue giants rule, oppressed humanoids rebel against their machine-like leaders.
cast: Jennifer Drake|Eric Baugin|Jean Topart|Jean Valmont|Sylvie Lenoir|Michèle Chahan|Yves Barsacq|Hubert de Lapparent|Gérard Hernandez|Claude Joseph|Philippe Ogouz|Jacques Ruisseau|Max Amyl|Denis Boileau|Madeleine Clervanne|William Coryn|Poupy de Monneron|Christian de Tillière|Christian Echelard|Jeanine Forney|Pascal Kominakis|Andre Lambert|Mark Lesser|Serge Netter|Yvette Robin|André Rouyer|Irina Tarassov|Julien Thomast|Gilbert Vilhon|Paul Villé|Cynthia Adler|Barry Bostwick|Mark Gruner|Nora Heflin|Marvin Miller|Monika Ramirez|Hal Smith|Olan Soule|Janet Waldo
title: El planeta salvaje
